name: Gone Maggie Gone
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Billy Kimball, Ian Maxtone-Graham
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: In order to rescue Maggie from a Catholic orphanage, Lisa must solve a series of puzzles to reveal the identity of a gem that will bring peace to Springfield.
